name: Going Deep (pop__esp)
description:
In Going Deeper your goal is to see how deep into the caverns you can go. Climb down progressively harder randomly generated levels searching for an exit, where at the end of every level you will be taken to a shop where you can purchase permanent upgrades with gold you have dug up.

Be careful to manage your Stamina as it is depleted from digging and taking damage. Search for bugs to eat to restore your stamina.

Controls:

WASD or the arrow keys to move

W or Up is jump

Spacebar is used to dig/accept

R is used to restart at level 1
